name: write lines
desc: Save a series of points with data connected by lines. These lines are stored in the EVS Line File format.

properties.name: Check For Cell Set Data
properties.desc: The Check For Cell Set Data toggle will cause any cell data that is constant throughout its cell set to be written as a cell set data component.

properties.name: Translate By Origin
properties.desc: The Translate by Origin toggle will cause the output to be written in the users coordinate space.  When this is turned off the output will be written around the origin.
